column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Not the best tapas I've had
column2: but not the worst either. I came here for brunch a few weeks ago and left satisfied. Sometimes the pacing of tapas can be off
column3: but this was on point and well spaced out. The sauce that comes with the patatas bravas will have you hoping for more. I did have a minor discrepancy with my credit card bill after the fact
column4: but the manager resolved the issue quickly and explained that the waitress had made an honest mistake. I wouldn't go out of my way to return
column5: but would definitely go back if invited by a friend.
